properties.name: qprov.ibmq.token
properties.description: Token to enable access to IBMQ.

properties.name: qprov.ibmq.execute-calibration
properties.description: True if QProv should execute calibration circuits on IBMQ to determine required data, false otherwise. When set to false some functionality may not be available in the QProv API.

properties.name: qprov.ibmq.auto-collect
properties.description: True if QProv should automatically retrieve provenance data regularly from IBMQ, false if the collection should only be done when invoking the collector API.

properties.name: qprov.ibmq.auto-collect-interval
properties.description: The interval in minutes in which the provenance data is retrieved if qprov.ibmq.auto-collect is set to true.
